```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE, collapse = TRUE)
```

```{r}
library(jack)
library(microbenchmark)
```

```{r}
julia <- Jack_julia()
x <- c(1/2, 2/3, 1, 2/3, -1, -2, 1)
lambda <- c(5, 3, 2, 2, 1)
alpha <- 3
microbenchmark(
  R = Jack(x, lambda, alpha),
  Julia = julia$Jack(x, lambda, alpha),
  times = 5
)
```
